医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
AGA 发布新的临床指南，帮助识别周期性呕吐综合征的症状美国胃肠病学协会 (AGA) 发布了新的临床指南，以帮助临床医生和患者识别周期性呕吐综合征 (CVS) 的体征和症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/AGA-releases-new-clinical-guidance-to-help-recognize-the-symptoms-of-cycling-vomiting-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/AGA-releases-new-clinical-guidance-to-help-recognize-the-symptoms-of-cycling-vomiting-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec6acea2-6d47-468b-8443-aa7f536a9a8f Tue, 16 Jul 2024 12:18:14 -0400 AGA releases new clinical guidance to help recognize the symptoms of cyclic vomiting syndrome
早期检测特定的 microRNA 可能有助于预测孕妇的先兆子痫先兆子痫 (PE) 是全球孕产妇发病率和死亡率增加的一个重要因素，在美国这一数字尤其令人震惊，它影响了大约 2-8% 的妊娠，导致早产以及婴儿的相关发病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Early-detection-of-specific-microRNAs-may-help-predict-preeclampsia-in-pregnant-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Early-detection-of-specific-microRNAs-may-help-predict-preeclampsia-in-pregnant-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dae0a036-b02a-4b73-bee7-da85ec78090d Tue, 16 Jul 2024 12:13:52 -0400 Early detection of specific microRNAs may help predict preeclampsia in pregnant women
连接化学和计算来对抗癌症Vincent Zoete 正在开发对抗癌症的计算机工具。这位领导洛桑大学和瑞士生物信息学研究所两个小组的化学家预测了新药的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Bridging-chemistry-and-computing-to-combat-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Bridging-chemistry-and-computing-to-combat-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea0de142-c6aa-459e-9d3f-f679e3ccdc62 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 12:06:00 -0400 Bridging chemistry and computing to combat cancer
纽约大学朗格健康中心连续第三年在神经病学和神经外科领域排名第一纽约大学朗格健康中心 (NYU Langone Health) 重申了其作为美国顶级神经病学和神经外科医院的地位，在《美国新闻与世界报道》对领先医院的年度评估中连续第三年排名第一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/NYU-Langone-Health-earns-No-1-spot-in-neurology-and-neurosurgery-for-the-third-straight-year.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/NYU-Langone-Health-earns-No-1-spot-in-neurology-and-neurosurgery-for-the-third-straight-year.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2324dcc-8b05-447b-9824-f30b0f48982e Tue, 16 Jul 2024 09:30:41 -0400 NYU Langone Health earns No. 1 spot in neurology and neurosurgery for the third straight year
在密歇根州代孕合法化之前，家庭找到了绕过禁令的方法塔米和乔丹·迈尔斯第一次抱双胞胎时，这对早产儿非常脆弱，他们的小脸大多被氧气面罩和氧气管遮住。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Before-Michigan-legalized-surrogacy-families-found-ways-around-the-ban.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Before-Michigan-legalized-surrogacy-families-found-ways-around-the-ban.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b94912f-9cbd-4c91-8b1d-1c8b382b1e81 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 09:01:28 -0400 Before Michigan legalized surrogacy, families found ways around the ban
研究表明，从吸烟转向在室内吸电子烟可能会减少儿童对尼古丁的二手接触研究人员比较了接触二手烟草烟雾、二手蒸汽的儿童和未接触二手烟的儿童的尼古丁吸收情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Study-suggests-switching-from-smoking-to-vaping-indoors-may-reduce-childrene28099s-secondhand-exposure-to-nicotine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Study-suggests-switching-from-smoking-to-vaping-indoors-may-reduce-childrene28099s-secondhand-exposure-to-nicotine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21cb0d87-7270-40e5-a540-61acc7480109 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 07:54:00 -0400 Study suggests switching from smoking to vaping indoors may reduce children’s secondhand exposure to nicotine
基于地中海饮食的干预措施与儿童和青少年心脏代谢生物标志物有何关联？研究人员回顾并荟萃分析了随机临床试验（RCT），评估基于地中海饮食的干预措施对儿童和青少年心脏代谢生物标志物的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/What-is-the-association-of-Mediterranean-diete28093based-interventions-with-cardiometabolic-biomarkers-in-children-and-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/What-is-the-association-of-Mediterranean-diete28093based-interventions-with-cardiometabolic-biomarkers-in-children-and-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf45705b-22d6-4730-803d-c7a8efc6fe3c Tue, 16 Jul 2024 07:11:00 -0400 What is the association of Mediterranean diet–based interventions with cardiometabolic biomarkers in children and adolescents?
